data.name: Name
data.entity_id: ID of the entity that tracks current available to EVSE
data.phase_a_current_entity_id: Sensor that measures grid current for phase A (required)
data.phase_b_current_entity_id: Sensor for phase B current (optional - set to 'None' for single-phase setups)
data.phase_c_current_entity_id: Sensor for phase C current (optional - set to 'None' for single/two-phase setups)
data.main_breaker_rating: Rating of the main breaker (per phase)
data.invert_phases: Invert current readings if import measures as a negative number
data.max_import_power_entity_id: Sensor that contains the maximum import power allowed. Create a helper sensor to set this value (domain: 'sensor' or 'input_number',  Device class: 'power')
data.excess_export_threshold: Excess Export Power Threshold, at which the car starts charging (W)

data.evse_single_phase: Single Phase EVSE in a multi-phase power setup
data.evse_single_phase_current_entity_id: Sensor that measures grid current for single phase EVSE (optional - set to 'None' for single-phase setups)
data.evse_current_import_entity_id: Sensor that measures the current imported by the EVSE (What car acctually uses, sum of all phases)
data.evse_current_offered_entity_id: Sensor that measures the current offered by the EVSE (What the EVSE tells the car it can use, per phase)
data.ocpp_profile_timeout: Timeout in seconds for OCPP profile
data.charge_pause_duration: Duration in seconds to pause charging

data.battery_power_entity_id: Sensor that measures battery power (positive for discharge, negative for charge)
data.battery_soc_entity_id: Sensor that measures battery state of charge (SOC) in %
data.battery_soc_target_entity_id: Input number entity for target battery SOC (%) (10-100, step 5)
data.battery_max_charge_power: Maximum battery charge power. In excess mode car starts charging when this power is reached (W)
data.battery_max_discharge_power: Maximum battery discharge power. Used for ccalculating charge power when battery SOC is above target SOC (W)

internal_entities.description: Configure internal/advanced entities for Dynamic OCPP EVSE

data.charging_mode_entity_id: Input select entity that sets the charging mode
data.update_frequency: Frequency in seconds to update the EVSE status
